summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Meridian Avenue from East Green Lake Blvd. To Lawrence Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers to under Ordinance No. 25842, creating Local Improvement District No. 2434 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing the delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
